name: cog-second-brain
description: A self-evolving second brain system using Claude Code, Obsidian markdown files, and Git version control. Features specialized AI agents for knowledge management, daily intelligence briefings, and strategic insights extraction.

skills.name: onboarding
skills.description: Personalize COG for your workflow - creates profile, interests, and watchlist files (run this first!)

skills.name: braindump
skills.description: Quick capture of raw thoughts with intelligent domain classification and competitive intelligence extraction

skills.name: daily-brief
skills.description: Generate personalized news intelligence with verified sources (7-day freshness requirement)

skills.name: weekly-checkin
skills.description: Cross-domain pattern analysis and strategic reflection for weekly review

skills.name: knowledge-consolidation
skills.description: Build frameworks from scattered insights across all braindumps and notes

skills.name: url-dump
skills.description: Quick capture URLs with automatic content extraction, insights, and categorization into knowledge booklets

features: Privacy-first architecture with strict domain separation
Plain text markdown files (no database, no vendor lock-in)
Multi-device sync via iCloud (iPhone, iPad, Mac)
Git version control for tracking thinking evolution
Progressive disclosure for efficient context usage

requirements.git: Optional but recommended for version control

installation.quickStart: Clone repo into Obsidian vault, copy .claude directory, run /onboarding

directoryStructure..claude/skills: 6 specialized agent skills (onboarding, braindump, daily-brief, weekly-checkin, knowledge-consolidation, url-dump)
directoryStructure.00-inbox: Temporary processing area with profile and interests files

skillArchitecture.description: Self-contained skills that combine orchestration and specialized processing using Claude's progressive disclosure pattern
